mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SHOW_REPLY (REPLY_NUMBER, USER_NUMBER, SHOW_NUMBER, REPLY_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_USER_SHOW_REPLY_NUMBER.NEXTVAL, #{userNumber}, #{showNumber}, #{replyContent})
